Name: HighQ Quiz
About the game: HighQ Quiz HighQ Quiz is a simple quiz game that will allow you to practice your knowledge on all subjects. The will be constantly updated with new questions and will offer a wide variety of categories. Gammodes Lives Mode - The Player starts with 3 lives and will lose if he answers the third question incorrectly Time Mode - Play against the clock. Getting a question right will add more time and getting it wrong will remove time. If time runs out, the player has lost Endless Mode - Don't like the stress of time and lives? Just want to learn? Fear not, endless mode will allow you to endless play to your hearts content. Features Life Lines - Life Lines give the player help to continue playing and can be used once per game. The 2 in the game (More to be added) are, '50-50' which removes 2 incorrect options and 'Swap', which allows players to change the question for another. Categories - Never kicked a ball in your life? Dont know the capital of France? You can disable categories you dont like in the New Game menu
